content: if you liked my sakura face scrubbies pattern here s a matching washcloth pattern slightly_smiling_face **difficulty ** advanced beginner / intermediate this design is using front post and back post stitches combined with puff stitches to create a nice textured look with my signature sakura motif in the centre you will need approx 120-131 yards 100% cotton dk yarn and a 4 mm crochet hook if you need any further information or help don t hesitate to contact me have fun and happy crocheting *krisztina*
